@ danman81 - To exstract open up your winrar then select File/Open Archive and then change the Save as File Type to All Files. Find the file and click open then just drag and drop to exstract. I have had the prblem b4.

To make clear this does look to be an actual Fuzion Frenzy. I have not burned it yet, but i ran it through abgx and it came out clean and is Region Free.
This is Fuzion Frenzy 2. But the .iso file is damaged and you have to run it through AGBX before burning.
